mapper.select: select count(1) from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo where JS_InternetBankPhone = #{phone}
select JS_InternetBankPhone from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo where JS_IDNumber = #{jsIDNumber}
select count(1) from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo where JS_IDNumber = #{jsIdnumber}

select JS_ClientID, JS_InternetBankUserName, JS_InternetBankPassWord, JS_CookieRecord, JS_IDNumber, JS_InternetBankPhone, JS_OnlineBankRegistrationTime from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo where JS_IDNumber = #{jsIdnumber}

select JS_ClientID, JS_InternetBankUserName, JS_InternetBankPassWord, JS_CookieRecord, JS_IDNumber, JS_InternetBankPhone, JS_OnlineBankRegistrationTime from JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo(JS_IDNumber,JS_ClientID, JS_InternetBankUserName, JS_InternetBankPassWord, JS_InternetBankPhone) values (#{jsIdnumber},#{jsClientid}, #{jsInternetbankusername}, #{jsInternetbankpassword}, #{jsInternetbankphone})
mapper.update:
update JSBanKUserInfo.JsClientInternetBankInfo
JS_ClientID = #{jsClientid},
JS_InternetBankUserName = #{jsInternetbankusername},
JS_InternetBankPassWord = #{jsInternetbankpassword},
JS_CookieRecord = #{jsCookierecord},
JS_InternetBankPhone = #{jsInternetbankphone},
JS_OnlineBankRegistrationTime = #{jsOnlinebankregistrationtime},
where JS_IDNumber = #{jsIdnumber}
